text: The 2019 Kent State Golden Flashes football team represented Kent State University in the 2019 NCAA Division I FBS football season. They were led by second year head coach Sean Lewis and played their home games at Dix Stadium in Kent, Ohio, as members of the East Division of the Mid-American Conference. ==Previous season== The Golden Flashes finished the 2018 season 2–10 1–7 in MAC Play to finish in last place in the East Division for the second year in a row. ==Preseason== ===MAC media poll=== The MAC released their preseason media poll on July 23, 2019, with the Golden Flashes predicted to finish in fourth place in the East Division. {| class="wikitable" |- align="center" |align="center" Colspan="3" |East Division |- align="center" |- align="center" | 1 || Ohio || 144 (24) |- align="center" | 2 || Miami || 107 |- align="center" | 3 || Buffalo || 100 |- align="center" | 4 || Kent State || 62 |- align="center" | 5 || Akron || 54 |- align="center" | 6 || Bowling Green || 37 |} ==Schedule== Source:2019 Kent State Golden Flashes football schedule. FBSchedules.com.
